TI -
Non-stimulating nitroglycerin oral cavity pharmaceutical preparations -
contain non-stimulating nitroglycerin, affinity carriers, e.g. fructose and water soluble
polymers e.g. hydroxypropyl cellulose

front.div:
AB -
Non-stimulating nitroglycerine (I) oral cavity pharmaceutical prepns.
comprise (I), (I)-affinitive carriers, and water-soluble polymers.
The (I)-affinitive carriers are one or more of (I) alcohol-soluble esters, (2) inclusions
substances such as alpha1-, beta-, or gamma-cyclodextrin, (3) (I)-soluble alcohol such
as glycerine polyethylene glycol and propylene glycol, or (4) (I)-soluble fats and oils
such as medium chain fatty acid triglycerides, plant or animal fats and oils, and
lipophilic vitamins. The water-soluble polymers are selected from hydroxypropyl
cellulose, hydroxypropyl methyl cellulose, polyvinylpyrrolidone, polyvinylalcohol,
and pulluan.
Compsns. of 1+/-0.55 pts. wt. lactose and 30 pts. wt. hydroxypropyl cellulose per 1
pts. wt. (I), compsns. of 4 +/-0.5 pts. wt. medium chain fatty acid triglyceridides and
25 +/-5 pts. wt. hydroxypropyl cellulose per 1 pts. wt. (I), or compsns. or 0.6 +/-0.4
pts. wt. propylene glycol and 30 +/-5 pts. wt. hydroxypropyl methyl cellulose per 1
pts. wt. (I) are claimed.
Prepn. comprises dissolution or dispersion of (I) and (I)-affinitive carriers in ethanol,
removal of the ethanol, adsorption or dispersion of the residue to the water-soluble
polymer, and pulverisation.
-USE/ADVANTAGE :
The pharmaceutical prepns., useful in the treatment of angina pectoris, are time-
dependently stable, excellent in oral cavity adhesion, and palatably good, and cause
no trouble to the oral cavity such as gustation abnormalities. The prepns. are also
excellent in controlled release property.
